name: Tito's Revenge
description:
Play as Tito in this top down, western inspired action shooter, with a just a touch of sci-fi.

--

"I just buried my friends after a shootout gone awry, but those damn Evil Souls won't stop releasing them from their graves! Well, I think they are going to be surprised when they meet my little friend, El' VaccuumOLaser5000. They are going to wish they never stepped foot in my graveyard."
